TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InkCanvasEditingMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the editing mode for the

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> properties use the InkCanvasEditingMode to specify how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> behaves when it receives input from a tablet pen.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to allow users to partially erase strokes with the inverted tip of a stylus. An elliptical cursor appears on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> when the user erases ink.
[!code-cs[InkCanvasSamples#6](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/InkCanvasSamples/Window1.xaml.cs#6)] [!code-vb[InkCanvasSamples#6](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/InkCanvasSamples/Window1.xaml.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode EraseByPoint = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the pen erases part of a stroke when the pen intersects the stroke.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode EraseByStroke = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the pen erases an entire stroke when the pen intersects the stroke.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode GestureOnly = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the responds to gestures, and does not receive ink.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode Ink = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that ink appears on the when the pen sends data to it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode InkAndGesture = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the responds to gestures, and receives ink.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that no action is taken when the pen sends data to the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode Select = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the pen selects strokes and elements on the .
